title: POCO X4 Pro 5G (Yellow, 128 GB)  (6 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, 67W Power Adapter, USB Type A-C Cable, Sim Ejector Tool, Transparent Case, Pre-Applied Screen Protector, User Guide, Warranty Card
product_specification.Sound Enhancements: Dual Stereo Speakers, Hi Res Audio Certified for Headphones, Dolby Atmos
product_specification.Other Display Features: Aspect Ratio: 20:9, In-Cell AMOLED Dot Display with 120Hz Refresh Rate, 1200 nits Peak Brightness, Contrast Ratio: 4500000:1, NTSC Ratio: Supports DCI-P3 Color Gamut, Screen Mirror/ Cast: Yes
product_specification.Operating Frequency: 5G SA: N1/N3/N5/N8/N28/N40/N78, 5G NSA: N1/N3/N78, 4G LTE FDD: B1/B3/B5/B8, 4G LTE TDD: B40/B41, 3G WCDMA: B1/B2/B5/B8, 2G GSM: B2/B3/B5/B8
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Triple Camera Setup: 64MP Main Camera (Samsung ISOCELL S5KGW3, f/1.8 Aperture, Pixel Size: 0.7um, (4-in-1: 16MP, 1.4um)) + 8MP Ultra Wide Camera (f/2.2 Aperture, Pixel Size: 1.12um, FOV: 118 Degree) + 2MP Macro Camera, Phase Detection Auto Focus, Camera Feature: HDR, AI Portrait Mode, Pro Mode, AI Scene Detection, Night Mode, Short Video, Slow Motion, Time Lapse, Panorama, AI Watermark, Pro Color, Timed Burst, Tilt Shift, Ultra Wide Mode, Macro Mode, Long Exposure, Dual Video
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 16MP Camera Setup: (f/2.45 Aperture, Pixel Size: 1.0um), Camera Feature: HDR, AI Portrait Mode, Screen Flash, Selfie Timer, Portrait Selfies, Palm shutter
product_specification.Video Recording Resolution: Rear Camera: 1080p (at 30 fps) | Front Camera: 1080p (at 30 fps)
product_specification.Sensors: Ambient Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor, E-Compass, Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Fingerprint Scanner
product_specification.Other Features: Fingerprint Scanner Position: Side Mounted (Power Key), Face Unlock, Dual App Support, Standby Time (4G): 650 Hours, 67W MMT Fast Charging, Corning Gorilla Glass 5, UFS 2.2, IR Blaster, Dual Microphone, Body: Glass Back
product_specification.Warranty Summary: One Year for Handset, 6 Months for Accessories

product_description.Incredible Display: The POCO X4 Pro 5G has a 16.91 cm (6.67) 120 Hz Super AMOLED screen with a 360 Hz touch sampling rate that delivers a smooth user experience. With the most vibrant colours and a DCI P3 extensive colour spectrum, the display confers an incredible viewing experience. It performs extremely smoothly while gaming, browsing, and streaming your favourite TV show. Furthermore, 1200 nits of intensive brightness provides a pleasant vision even in the scorching sun light.
product_description.Sonic Charging: With a 5000 mAh battery that can last up to two days, this phone also boasts a 67 W Sonic charging with MMT technology that allows you to charge your phone from 0 to 100% in around 41 minutes without overheating your phone.
product_description.Stellar Design: The POCO X4 Pro 5G features a sleek, light, and stunning design with an all-glass body. It's the X-series gadget that's ever been thinner and lighter Thanks to a light-reflecting rear panel that features a dramatic sheen with an intriguing haze pattern.
product_description.Enthralling Camera: This phone comes with a triple camera configuration, that comprises of astonishing 64 MP primary camera and an 8 MP Ultra-wide camera that enables a 118-degree field of vision that ensures to level-up your photographing creativity by delivering gorgeous imagery. Furthermore, it boasts a 16 MP front camera that suffices your desire of clicking flawless selfies.

review:
1.Fast delivery by Flipkart
2.Delivery personal's behaviour was very good
3.Lookwise awesome
4. Display quality 👌
5. Camera is also good but for clear picture we have to use 64 mp camera only which gives me a dslr photography like feeling
6. Quick charging and battery backup is also good after use for 3 to 4 hours my battery consumption is as follows : 92% to 84% after use for 4 hours

This is my review after a half day of use may be give another review after 1 month of use

😊😊😊😊😊😊😊

Received the phone today. Thanks to Flipkart was super fast delivery. Ordered the yellow colour for my mom because it appeared classy. Inside the box, we had the phone, adaptor, case and original bill. Well, i have two things to say. Yes, the handset actually looks good to the eyes and feels premium in hand. Battery is very good. I could see the phone charging up to 100% within 30 minutes and i used the phone throughout the day and it's still on 51%.

Camera is Decent enough to make you capture good clicks. Performance is fast. Yes, there are bugs . There are many pre installed applications that i uninstalled so that took time. Super Amoled screen really works good.

Overall, i feel this is really a nice phone for me. However, i do feel this is, if not much, overpriced by 2-3K rupees. The price was more justified if POCO offered Snapdragon 775g processor and not Android 11. That's just my own point of view though. Rest is fine. No idea about gaming because that's not why i brought it for.

Overall, a 4/5 i would say.

Poco has made its hard phone camera quality is awesome . Yellow color phone super it's shinning back . I played bmi game it worked very well . The charging . It ccharges in just 40 minutes . Awesome in this price you can buy this. The dual stereo speakers hearing music and watching movies is super.
Awesome classy phone everything is good ...value for money... But camera needs to more improve by update
Awesome

Guys this is the best true amoled display other makers are fooling people's telling amoled but this is real amoled colors are punchy and display is bright enough just go for this multimedia, gaming purpose it's a treat... I never posted reviews in my life this is the first time.. Touch responsive is super... But one thing go for 128gb variant instead of 64 because os took 20gb remaining only 40 gb available. Thank you

Camera is very bad in this price segment. Realme cameras are much better
Display and sound quality is awesome.
Performance is good but I felt like I was not getting 60 fps in cod mobile. There is also ram management issue.
Battery is good. 67 watt charger does it work. But if use in 120 fps battery drops quite fast

Released with less specification than expected like instead of 108MP, its with 64MP.
Processor could have been on higher side instead of Snapdragon 695, it could have been 7xx, 8xx.

Pros:
Camera quality is still good in light, not great in dark though but fine enough.
Due to 120HZ refresh rate, touch responses are pretty quick.
Lookwise premium look.
Feels somewhat bulky and heavy a bit.
Charging is faster due to high Watt charger support, with heavy usage full charging lasts for more than a day.
Data transfer is quick.
Screen video play is very crisp and clear.
Audio play also very loud and clear.
Wifi also works fine.
Mic, speaker while talking on call is descent.
3.5 audio jack support is supportive for normal day to day quick usage.
Device build is sturdy while holding, handling it.
Flipkart's box packing is worst I have experienced, no cushion or good boxing at all for such price tag item.

Cons:
At this price tag, in competative market 4k video capturing support should be there with respective hardware support.
Expected more clarity at night photos, shoot capture, 108MP or processing optimization can be still scope to take care through updates.
Price still could have been lesser than upto 15k as specifications camera/processor wise are lower than expected.
Scratches observed on the box, though seal was packed but this should not have happened in competative ecommerce market.
Delivery experience was annoying from flipkart delivery service, as it was reached after 1st day only to nearby hub, but still after multiple follow-ups with customer care/delivery service it got delivered on 2nd day's end as per estimated timeline mentioned.

2.Delivery personal's behaviour was very good
3.Lookwise awesome
4. Display quality 👌
5. Camera is also good but for clear picture we have to use 64 mp camera only which gives me a dslr photography like feeling
6. Quick charging and battery backup is also good after use for 3 to 4 hours my battery consumption is as follows : 92% to 84% after use for 4 hours

This is my review after a half day of use may be give another review after 1 month of use

with the kind of reviews that has come, was expecting a very good phone. This review is after 1 day use,
my Observations
1) sluggish, and slow takes time :-(
2) Display doesn't flow well.
3) Though there is stereo speakers, volume is not high enough.
4) Camera: Front camera is pretty bad. Rear camera though it is 64MP doesn't match to other phones, could have been much better.
5) Low light quality of images is not great.
6) Phone is bulky.
7) Doesn't respond to touch many times.
8) Scroll is not smooth :-(

I haven't faced this type situation yet. There are so many glitches in phone like when we get a call the display is not showing anything for 4 to 5 seconds. When i decrease the volume to 50% I can't Audible anything from speakers and phone also getting hang sometimes and it becomes slow. It getting switched off automatically without any action by my side. Battery back up also not yet good and taking more time to charge the phone. When I took a selfie or a photo the camera pixels are not good when I zoom in the image pixels that are very badly defined so much blurry it shouldn't happen in real time 64MP AI featured camera phone.

The 120 Hz AMOLED display is its biggest strength without a doubt & it is gorgeous. The phone generally feels pretty fast & responsive, need to see how it holds up long term since my Poco X3 slowed down significantly in a year.

The camera is clearly a disappointment but they had to cut some corners somewhere to get it to that price point. And the usual bloatware.

answers: A:no, finger print is on power button
A:Both are effecient but 732 is little better I think

A:Yes, POCO X4 Pro 5G comes with AI scene detection that detects multiple scenes on both the front and rear to create better images. It also has multiple software camera modes to drive your creativity.
A:The phone comes with dual-Stereo speaker setup making it a perfect multimedia powerhouse with immersive stereo sound.
A:Yes, POCO X4 Pro 5G has support for OTG. (The OTG connector is not included in the box contents, & needs to be purchased separately)
A:POCO X4 Pro 5G features support for expandable memory, which means you can expand storage by upto 1TB on top of the internal storage.
A:The display on the POCO X4 Pro 5G comes with Corning� Gorilla� Glass 5 for protection against day-to-day scratches and a pre-applied screen protector.
A:Yes, the POCO X4 Pro 5G is 5G Dual SIM Dual Standby ready
A:Yes, POCO X4 Pro 5G comes with a 67W turbo charger in the box which can charge the battery from 0-100% in 41 minutes.
A:Yes, the POCO X4 Pro 5G comes with a 3.5mm headphone jack.
A:POCO X4 Pro 5G runs MIUI 13 out of the box based on Android 11
A:Not separately. Hybrid sim slot. Either a secondary sim or a SD card can be installed.
